sentence: Mandela Barnes, state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski, and Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson also have highlighted their push to scrap the filibuster.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Democratic Senate candidates put changing the filibuster front and center

sentence: Out in Outagamie County, Wisconsin, two flights and a lengthy Lyft ride from Capitol Hill, US Senate candidate Tom Nelson follows events in Washington with disbelief as leaders of his own Democratic Party resist banning members of Congress from buying and selling stock.
author: Dave Levinthal
title: Democratic candidates blast Biden and Pelosi for not pushing Congress to pass a stock trade ban for lawmakers: 'Get in the ring!'

sentence: Mandela Barnes' new internal from Impact Research (formerly known as Anzalone Liszt Grove or ALG) gives him a 38-17 lead over Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry in the August Democratic primary, with state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski and Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson at 9% and 8%, respectively.
title: Daily Kos Elections Live Digest: 3/29

sentence: In many ways, Barnes, Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry, Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson and state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski are following the political path Baldwin blazed.
author: Bill Glauber
title: Democratic U.S. Senate contenders in Wisconsin focus on manufacturing

sentence: Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson has said China is eating our lunch,? when it comes to trade, while Milwaukee Bucks basketball team executive Alex Lasry vowed to stand up to China? in a TV ad.
author: Julia Manchester
title: Midwest Democrats go all in on tough-on-China approach

sentence: Among the candidates are Mandela Barnes, the current lieutenant governor; Alex Lasry, son to a part-owner of the Milwaukee Bucks; Sarah Godlewski, current state treasurer; and Tom Nelson, current Outagamie County executive.
author: Salena Zito
title: The tea leaves in Wisconsin look promising for Republicans
